original_text: Then Joseph removed them from his knees, and he bowed himself with his face to the earth.
korean_text: 요셉이 아버지의 무릎 사이에서 두 아들을 물러나게 하고 땅에 엎드려 절하고

sentences.original_text: Then Joseph removed them from his knees
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 요셉은 그들을 자신의 무릎에서 내려놓았다

sentences.original_text: and he bowed himself with his face to the earth
